src:
Borac dobio derbi Republike Srpske, Vranješ nastavio rafal
Banjalučani vezali šesto slavlje, nekadašnji vezista Vojvodine došao do brojke od 10. postignutih golova

03 Nov 2019


Borac iz Banjaluke je nastavio seriju pobeda, pošto je u derbiju savladao Radnik iz Bijeljine sa 2:0 i nastavio poteru za vodećim timom Premijer lige BiH Sarajevom.

Bilo je to šesto uzastopno slavlje ekipe Branislava Krunića, a sjajnu gogetersku seriju nastavio je kapiten i apsolutni lider ovog tima Stojan Vranješ. Nekadašnji vezista Vojvodine, Legije i Lehije, došao je do cifre od 10 postignutih golova u sezoni. On je to učinio na 15 utakmica i izjednačio se sa Sulejmanom Krpićem iz Željezničara i Vojom Ubiparipom iz Tuzle.
Radnik se dobro držao samo do 48. minuta, kada je Borac poveo autogolom Ivana Šuberta. Konačno, svaka dilema je razrešena u 80. minutu kada je Vranješ postavio konačan rezultat sa bele tačke.
Borac nakon 15 odigranih kola ima četiri boda manje od Sarajeva, tako da je bitka još uvek otovrena i biće tako samo ukoliko ekipa iz Banjaluke nastavi sa odličnim rezultatima. Izuzetno važan deo posla mogao bi da im odradi Radnik, koji će narednog vikenda dilejatu upravo lidera na tabeli.
BiH 1 - 15. KOLO:
Subota
Zvijezda - Zrinjski 2:0 (1:0)
Velež - Sloboda 2:2 (1:1)
Tuzla Siti - Mladost 1:0 (1:0)
Sarajevo - Široki Brijeg 3:0 (2:0)
Nedelja
Borac - Radnik 2:0 (0:0)
Željezničar - Čelik (otkazan)
text:
Fighter won the derby of Republika Srpska, Vranjes continued the burst
Banjaluka tied for sixth celebration, former Vojvodina midfielder reaches 10 goals scored

03 Nov 2019


The Banja Luka fighter went on to win the series, as he defeated Radnik from Bijeljina 2-0 in the derby and continued his pursuit of BiH Premier League team Sarajevo.

It was the sixth consecutive celebration of Branislav Krunic's team, and the great and ghetto series was continued by captain and absolute leader of the team, Stojan Vranješ. Former midfielder of Vojvodina, Legija and Lehija, has reached the number of 10 goals scored in the season. He did it in 15 games and equalized with Sulejman Krpic of Zeljeznicar and Vojo Ubiparip of Tuzla.
The worker only kept well until the 48th minute, when Borac took the lead by Ivan Schubert. Finally, each dilemma was resolved in the 80th minute when Vranjes set the final score from the white spot.
The fighter has four points less than Sarajevo after 15 games played, so the battle is still open and will only be so if the Banja Luka team continues with excellent results. An extremely important part of the job could be done by the Worker, who will be sending the leader to the table next weekend.
BiH 1 - 15
Saturday
Zvijezda - Zrinjski 2: 0 (1: 0)
Velez - Sloboda 2: 2 (1: 1)
Tuzla City - Mladost 1: 0 (1: 0)
Sarajevo - Siroki Brijeg 3: 0 (2: 0)
Sunday
Borac - Radnik 2: 0 (0: 0)
Rail - Steel (canceled)
